questions: Q. 1. How can we ensure the sustainability of development in our country ? Suggest any one [Board Term-I, Term-I, , 2016-17] way.
answers: Ans.  Introduction of organic farming.  Adopting measures to reduce global warming and implement global limits on carbon emission.   1

questions: Q. 2. “There is enough for everybody’s need but not for everybody’s greed. “ Who said these words ? [Board Term-I, Term-I, Set-M, DDE-2015]
Q. 3. State any one reason for over use of resources ?   Why ground water is over used?
answers: Ans. Any one reason for the overuse of resources can be :  over population.  lack of awareness.  excessive use of tubewells, canals etc for irrigation.  industrial need.   1
